content.text: On August 8, 2025, the elizaOS/eliza repository showed significant activity with 8 new pull requests opened and 9 pull requests merged. Additionally, 2 new issues were created during this period. The repository had 5 active contributors participating in development activities.

PR #5744 titled 'feat: remove obsolete llms.txt and standardize workspace dependencies' is merged
PR #5742 titled 'feat: migrate from npx to bunx and improve XML parser' is merged
Issue #5747 titled 'Fixing bugs in eliza-cloud' by @samarth30 is OPEN.
